cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Great City Centre Location in the heart of the CBD.BEDDING FOR ONE PERSON,,Digital TV,Fridge(SHARED BATHROOM facilities,Free Wireless Internet.Close to all Melbournes attraction,MCG,Rod Laver Arena,Federation Square.Next to Free City Tram

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Great CBD City Centre Location Twin Room with New single beds, TV, fridge, Kettle, Shared bathroom Free Internet/Wireless. Close to all City attractions MCG, Rod Laver Arena Fed Square Next to Free Tram/Bus, Parking $25 per 24 hrs.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
